channel.title: XP lamps on 667 / 711?
channel.description: Can someone PLEASE tell me how to get XP lamps to work on RsCalifornia 667 / 711? i know its in button handler ofc... but can someone please tell me what the codes would be? i will rep++

item.title: XP lamps on 667 / 711?
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

would you first go into inventory options so, when players clicks the lamp, you can then make it open the xp skill lmap interface thing, then you gotta go to buttonhandler and interfacemanager etc i think?

atm i just added simple xp lamps, eg small summoning xp lamp, small dungeoneering lamp, which i added to inventoryoptions1 so when a player clicks it, it adds xp straight way to that specific skill, thats how far ive got so far XD cbf with adding all that interface, too much effort

Read full topic

item.title: XP lamps on 667 / 711?
item.dc:creator: @kiss_my_feet kiss my feet
item.description:
@kiss_my_feet wrote:

It is pretty simple. I could do it for you if you have the xp lamp interface id.

~Raph.

Read full topic

item.title: XP lamps on 667 / 711?
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

It wouldn’t be too hard to figure it out yourself tbh. I don’t have much experience with 667+ so I can’t really tell you what it would be. But the objective of a lamp is to give xp right? So find the method that will give xp, similar to addSkillXP in 317. Once you’ve got the basics down, you can then look into making it more complex with interfaces etc…

Read full topic
